typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		organizationid as string,
		ntt_identifier as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		importsequencenumber as string,
		ntt_moratoriumchildcancellationreasonid as string,
		createdby as string,
		ntt_parentcancellationreasonid as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		createdon as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceStaging
sourceStaging derive(tsCreatedOn = toTimestamp(createdon),
		tsModifiedOn = toTimestamp(modifiedon),
		strNTTMoratoriumChildCancellationReasonId = toString(ntt_moratoriumchildcancellationreasonid),
		strNTTName = toString(ntt_name)) ~> decolTypeConvertion
decolTypeConvertion derive(blIsValid = iif(isNull(tsCreatedOn) || isNull(tsModifiedOn) || isNull(strNTTMoratoriumChildCancellationReasonId) || isNull(strNTTName), toBoolean('0'), toBoolean('1'))) ~> dcolIsValid
dcolIsValid derive(tsCreatedOn = coalesce(tsCreatedOn, toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00')),
		tsModifiedOn = coalesce(tsModifiedOn, toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00')),
		strNTTMoratoriumChildCancellationReasonId = coalesce(strNTTMoratoriumChildCancellationReasonId,'missing'),
		strNTTName = coalesce(strNTTName, 'missing')) ~> dcolMandatoryValue
dcolMandatoryValue derive(blIsTruncate = iif(length(strNTTMoratoriumChildCancellationReasonId) > 36 || length(strNTTName) > 100, toBoolean('1'), toBoolean('0'))) ~> dcolIsTruncate
dcolIsTruncate derive(strNTTMoratoriumChildCancellationReasonId = left(strNTTMoratoriumChildCancellationReasonId, 36),
		strNTTName = left(strNTTName, 100)) ~> dcolMandatoryTruncate
dcolMandatoryTruncate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkValidation
